topic.title: Outcomes Inpatient Observations Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD_004" Hospital Outcomes Inpatient Observations Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Outcomes Inpatient Observations"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is Ventilator Days Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] Ventilator Days Observation

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is ICU Length Of Stay Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] ICU Length Of Stay Observation

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is Patient Degree Of Disability At Discharge
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Degree Of Disability At Discharge
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD_004" Hospital Outcomes Inpatient Observations Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Outcomes Inpatient Observations"
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is Ventilator Days Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] Ventilator Days Observation

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is ICU Length Of Stay Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] ICU Length Of Stay Observation

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is Patient Degree Of Disability At Discharge
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Degree Of Disability At Discharge
